name: Cozy Couch Cat
description: A calm cat who loves sunbeams, windowsills, and naps on your lap.

name: Trail Buddy Dog
description: An energetic dog that lives for hikes, fetch, and new smells.

name: Curious Ferret
description: Playful tunneler with a knack for exploring every corner.

name: Serene Aquarium
description: A peaceful aquascape with colorful fish and gentle movement.

name: Chatty Companion Bird
description: Vibrant and social, loves learning tunes and greeting you.

name: Purring Roommate
description: Independent but affectionate; always nearby when you’re home.

name: Playful Kitten
description: Tiny chaos engine: toys, zoomies, and sudden cuddles.

name: Gentle Giant Dog
description: Big paws, soft heart, and a talent for leaning on your leg.

name: Pocket Companion Dog
description: Small, portable, and convinced your lap is the best place to be.

name: Loyal Guardian Dog
description: Watchful and devoted, happiest when your whole pack is together.

name: Cuddle Bunny
description: Quiet companion with soft hops, gentle nose boops, and hay crunches.

name: Tiny Hamster
description: Wheel sprints at midnight; seed stashes by morning.

name: Sweet Guinea Pig
description: Wheeks for snacks, loves cozy hideouts, and gentle handling.

name: Clever Rat
description: Highly social, learns tricks fast, and bonds strongly with you.

name: Soft Chinchilla
description: Velvet fur, dust baths, and a gentle, curious personality.

name: Mellow Tortoise
description: Slow-paced friend who turns basking into an art form.

name: Curious Gecko
description: Nocturnal climber with big eyes and a talent for hanging out.

name: Quiet Snake
description: Low-noise companion for people who appreciate calm and routine.

name: Therapy Dog
description: Emotionally tuned-in buddy who’s always ready for a reassuring nudge.

name: Service Dog Partner
description: Focused, steady, and trained to help you thrive day to day.

name: Songbird Friend
description: Morning chirps, tiny hops, and a whole lot of personality.

name: Talkative Parrot
description: Smart and expressive; learns words, games, and household routines.

name: Pond Pal
description: Water garden vibes with gentle ripples and an easygoing rhythm.

name: Miniature Pig Pal
description: Snack-motivated, surprisingly clever, and full of goofy charm.
